Articles.Content:
Hi,

Just thought I'd say hello - I downloaded KSP a few weeks ago and have been reading stuff on these forums for a while for hints and tips, thought I may as well register an account. Plenty of questions will soon follow

Gav
Welcome Gav!! Since you have been lurking you already know how helpful this community is!

Like any space program, start out simple. build and fly suborbital ships first. Don't forget the parachute and stack coupler if you are flying Kerbal command capsule. Do gravity turns on the suborbital. Add a booster to the suborbital ship and go for orbit and recovery. Continue building bigger and better as you extend missions and become familiar with controlling your ship during your missions. Most of all, enjoy.
